text: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow () is a 1963 Italian-French comedy movie directed by Vittorio De Sica and starring Sophia Loren, Marcello Mastroianni, Aldo Giuffr√®, Agostino Salvietti, Tecla Scarano, Carlo Croccolo, Tina Pica, Armando Trovajoli. It won an Academy Award in 1965. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Vittorio De Sica
title: Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow
